heading: meet the double-decker mp3-cd
subheading: netdrives is set to release the brujo, a home stereo component that will play both conventional cds and mp3 files that have been burned onto plastic.
author: wired news report
text: as digital music continues to creep from the computer room to the living room, a company is preparing to unveil the first compact disc player that also plays mp3 files. on monday, netdrives will unveil the brujo, a us$299 device that plays both standard audio cds and mp3 files that have been burned onto cds.read wired news' ongoing mp3 coverage
